text: Trygve Bergeid (born 30 March 1942) is a Norwegian ice hockey player. He was born in Oslo, Nazi Germany (Occupied Norway) and represented the club Isbjørnene. He played for the Norwegian national ice hockey team, and participated at the Winter Olympics in Grenoble in 1968, where the Norwegian team placed 11th. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey players at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Norwegian ice hockey players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Norway Category:Sportspeople from Oslo
title: Trygve Bergeid
